Test Name: SDH Genes Mutation Analysis, Next-Generation Sequencing (Tumor)
Purpose: To detect and characterize mutations in SDH genes (SDHA, SDHB, SDHC, SDHD) in tumor samples using next-generation sequencing.
Container: Sterile microcentrifuge tube or FFPE tissue block
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, NanoDrop spectrophotometer, Qubit fluorometer, PCR thermocycler, next-generation sequencer (e.g., Illumina platform), bioinformatics software
